column6: The hunt continues for X-23 as she tries to make a normal life for herself.  But can she escape her violent past when not only the Facility that created her is hunting her, but S.H.I.E.L.D. as well?  X-23 is about to collide head first with the Marvel Universe, and sparks will fly as CAPTAIN AMERICA and DAREDEVIL join the chase!
column8: | penciller (cover):Michael Choi | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | colorist:Sonia Oback | letterer:Troy Peteri
